instructions: Activate the Google Assistant on your Android smartphone. This is done differently based on your device, Android version, and settings, so follow your device's instructions as appropriate. Google Delivery for food delivery does not currently work on Google Home devices as a screen is required to finalize the order. Say " Hey Google, order from [restaurant name]. " On your smartphone, tap Delivery . Choose your preferred delivery service. Choose the food to order and tap Add to Cart . Open the cart to review your items and tap Go to order . Tap Checkout . Review your order, add a tip, confirm the delivery address, time, and payment method. Tap Place order . You'll receive an email with a copy of your receipt.

Activate the Google Assistant on your Android smartphone. Say " Hey Google, reorder food from [restaurant name]. " The Assistant will access your past orders and display them on your mobile device. Open the cart to review your items and tap Go to order . Tap Checkout . Review your order, add a tip, confirm the delivery address, time, and payment method. Tap Place order . You'll receive an email with a copy of your receipt.
